results.title: [Nick Nolan]
results.brief_description:
An Olympic soccer player dives out of an Australian stamp to score a goal but hits his head on a rock and dies. People weep for him at his funeral.

An animated short entered to “Create a Stamp Story” section of ACMI’s ‘Screen It’ media making competition for Primary Schools.

results.title: [Luka Tsaktserlis]
results.brief_description:
An aeroplane comes to life out of the Australian stamp, “Australia circling the earth” and proceeds to fly to London.

An animated short entered to “Create a Stamp Story” section of ACMI’s ‘Screen It’ media making competition for Primary Schools.

results.title: [Brent Seymour]
results.brief_description:
The Murray River Queen gets into deep and treacherous waters. People try and save it with chopsticks but alas it eventually sinks. End caption: “they’s why the Poseidon uses a fork”.

An animated short entered to “Create a Stamp Story” section of ACMI’s ‘Screen It’ media making competition for Primary Schools.

results.title: [Adam Tsaktserlis]
results.brief_description:
A passenger on the Murray River Queen gets into trouble when he falls off the ship and seemingly gets eaten by a large fish. Subsequently, the steamer loses oil which drips into the sea.

An animated short entered to “Create a Stamp Story” section of ACMI’s ‘Screen It’ media making competition for Primary Schools.

results.title: The Shot
results.creator_credit: Peter Delfgou, Elizabeth Isaacs and Dan Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Sports training film series”.
This film on shot put shows how muscular force should be applied through the body to the shot. It demonstrates training and warm up procedures which should be used prior to the competition throw. From the series “Athletic training”.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Peter Delfgou, Elizabeth Isaacs and Dan Productions

results.title: Athletics: the sprint
results.creator_credit: Colin Moffat, Elizabeth Isaacs, Guardian Royal Exchange Assurance and Dan Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Sports training film series”.
One of a series of athletics training films. Looks at the sprinter with particular emphasis given to the development of running skills and starting from the blocks. Narrated by Ron Pickering.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Colin Moffat, Elizabeth Isaacs, Guardian Royal Exchange Assurance and Dan Productions

results.title: Strength training for sport
results.creator_credit: Paul Foxall, Elizabeth Isaacs and Dan Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Sports training film series”
The explosion of new athletic records has largely come about through strength training. The training program must strengthen all muscle groups. The various strength training techniques and exercises are demonstrated by top athletes.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Paul Foxall, Elizabeth Isaacs and Dan Productions

results.title: Athletics: the triple jump
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Sports training film series”.
Performances by international athletes Frank Attoh, Nat Augustin, Barbara Clarke, Reynold Edwards, Kim Hagger, Colin Mitchell and Daley Thompson are used to demonstrate and analyse the basic techniques of the triple jump. Narrated by Ron Pickering.
